question: If I was to get married to the one i love and he is religious and my marriage is cancelled is it also for my own good??
answer:
QUESTION

Does Anything God maks to us in this world is for our best? If I was to get married to the one i love and he is religious and my marriage is cancelled is it also for my own good??

ANSWER


Share:

Often, we do not grasp the wisdom behind everything. Allah, in His wisdom does certain things, which to us may seem bad for us but He is All-wise.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Muhammad Kadwa
FATWA DEPT.
